title: How to make my long distance relationship work - Attraction & Success - Quora

response.answer_text: Strong communication and Self-love Nowadays due to the advancement of technology having a long distance relationship can be easily maintained, unlike in the past where messages would take weeks or even months to arrive. That’s why strong communication is very vital, in which you should use the present technology as an opportunity. Do not let excuses to be a loose end of having a healthy long distance relationship. Communicate as much as possible make your partner feel as if you are close together and make your partner feel that there is a special someone who cares and supports. Always be there may not be physically but emotionally. Lastly self-love, if you value yourself and knows your worth you become a better person. Being a better person means you know your goals, this includes having a plan to succeed in life and not being afraid to be honest with your partner. Good examples are “planning to get a good education in order to expand life opportunities then start saving money to finally meet your partner in person”, “being yourself and not pretending to be someone else". By the time you learn to love yourself life improvements will follow and that includes relationships.
